elements.name: Name dem Aufgaben
elements.title: Look up the following terms and explain them:

elements.name: Frage 1
elements.title: Panama Papers:
elements.correctAnswer: Disclosure of confidential data confirming money laundering, tax offenses and other crimes committed by private individuals and companies from around 80 countries.

elements.name: Frage 2
elements.title: Freedom of the press:
elements.correctAnswer: Anyone is allowed to disseminate their opinion via any medium.

elements.name: Frage 3
elements.title: Propaganda:
elements.correctAnswer: Systematic dissemination of political, ideological or similar ideas and opinions. ideas and opinions with the aim of influencing the general consciousness of the population in a certain way.

elements.name: panel1
elements.title: Look up the following terms and explain them:

elements.name: question1
elements.title: Censorship:
elements.correctAnswer: Censorship is used to prevent, restrict or falsify unwanted or unauthorized content. It can affect both text and images.
